item.title: 欧盟担心美国拥抱加密资产会影响欧洲金融稳定
item.description: 欧元区高级官员周一表示，欧元区财长们担心，美国新政府拥抱加密货币的政策变化可能会影响欧元区的货币主权和金融稳定。【原文：Euro zone finance ministers are worried that the change of policy under the new U.S. administration to embrace cryptocurrencies could affect euro zone monetary sovereignty and financial stability, top officials said on Monday.】

item.title: 日产董事会周二开会讨论是否更换首席执行官内田
item.description: 日产汽车公司董事会将于周二召开会议，讨论首席执行官内田诚的潜在继任者。【原文：Nissan's board of directors will meet on Tuesday to discuss potential successors to CEO Makoto Uchida, who is under pressure to step down due to the Japanese automaker's worsening earnings performance and failed merger talks with Honda .】

item.title: 内政部长告诉彭博社：美国应重启已关闭的煤炭机组
item.description: 美国内政部长道格-伯格姆（Doug Burgum）周一在接受彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）视频采访时表示，根据唐纳德-特朗普总统的国家能源紧急状态声明，美国应重新启动已关闭的燃煤电厂。【原文：The United States should restart shuttered coal-fired power plants under President Donald Trump’s national energy emergency declaration, Interior Secretary Doug Burgum said in a video interview with Bloomberg News on Monday.】

item.title: 消息人士称高盛董事总经理斯科特-鲁布纳离职
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士周一告诉路透社，高盛集团衍生品销售和宏观执行团队的董事总经理斯科特-鲁布纳（Scott Rubner）已经离开了这家投资银行。【原文：Scott Rubner, a managing director in the derivatives sales and macro execution team at Goldman Sachs , has left the investment bank, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 纳斯达克的 Adena Friedman 称首次公开募股渠道依然健康
item.description: 交易所运营商纳斯达克（Nasdaq）首席执行官阿迪娜-弗里德曼（Adena Friedman）周一在佛罗里达州举行的国际投资协会博卡会议（FIA Boca conference）上说，美国首次公开募股的渠道很畅通，但投资者希望市场有更多的确定性。【原文：There is a healthy pipeline of U.S. initial public offerings, but investors are looking for more certainty in markets, Adena Friedman, chief executive officer at exchange operator Nasdaq , said on Monday at the FIA Boca conference in Florida.】

item.title: AT&T 第一季度利润符合预期，得益于 5G 和光纤扩张
item.description: AT&T 周一预测第一季度调整后利润与分析师预期一致，表明市场对其结合 5G 移动和高速光纤数据的打折高级计划需求稳定。【原文：AT&T forecast first-quarter adjusted profit in line with analysts' estimates on Monday, signaling steady demand for its discounted premium plans combining 5G mobile with high-speed fiber data.】

item.title: AT&T 第一季度利润符合预期，得益于 5G 和光纤扩张
item.description: AT&T 周一预测第一季度调整后利润与分析师预期一致，表明市场对其结合 5G 移动和高速光纤数据的打折高级计划需求稳定。【原文：AT&T forecast first-quarter adjusted profit in line with analysts' estimates on Monday, signaling steady demand for its discounted premium plans combining 5G mobile with high-speed fiber data.】

item.title: 马斯克称兼顾 DOGE 和 CEO 工作很困难，特斯拉股价下滑
item.description: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周一在接受《福克斯商业》采访时说，在与特朗普政府合作的同时，他的企业经营 "非常困难"。【原文：Elon Musk is running his businesses "with great difficulty" while working with the Trump administration, the Tesla CEO said on Monday in an interview with Fox Business.】

item.title: CERAWEEK 英联邦液化天然气公司在获得出口许可证后又引起了新的兴趣
item.description: Commonwealth LNG 项目的所有者周一表示，自上月获得美国总统唐纳德-特朗普政府颁发的出口许可证以来，潜在买家的兴趣有所增加。【原文：Commonwealth LNG has seen an increase in interest from prospective buyers since it secured an export license from the administration of U.S. President Donald Trump last month, the project's owner said on Monday.】

item.title: 早间竞价燃烧的市场波动即将点燃
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: Hinge Health申请在美国上市，医疗保健行业上市势头强劲
item.description: Hinge Health 公司提供数字运动疗法程序，帮助人们控制和克服肌肉和关节疼痛。【原文：Hinge Health, which provides digital exercise therapy programs to help people manage and overcome muscle and joint pain, on Monday filed for its long-sought New York initial public offering.】

item.title: 达美航空公司因经济不确定性下调第一季度业绩预期
item.description: 达美航空公司（Delta Air Lines）周一以宏观经济不确定性增加为由，下调了截至 3 月份的当季利润预期。【原文：Delta Air Lines on Monday slashed its profit estimates for the current quarter through March, citing increased macroeconomic uncertainty.】

item.title: 高盛称对冲基金两年来最大程度降低股票风险
item.description: 据高盛周一发布的一份报告称，对冲基金周五减少了股票投资，减持幅度为两年多来最大。【原文：Hedge funds reduced their exposure to stocks on Friday at the largest amount in more than two years, according to a Goldman Sachs note released on Monday.】

item.title: 受中国禁售令影响，Illumina下调业绩展望，将削减1亿美元成本
item.description: 在中国宣布禁止进口其基因测序仪器后，Illumina 周一下调了其年度预期，并表示计划削减 1 亿美元的支出。【原文：Illumina on Monday lowered its annual forecast and said it plans to cut $100 million in spending after China announced a ban on imports of its genetic sequencing instruments.】

item.title: 甲骨文第三季度营收不及预期
item.description: 甲骨文公司周一公布的第三季度营收不及华尔街预期，原因是企业在云基础设施服务上的支出疲软，以及来自大型企业的激烈竞争。【原文：Oracle missed Wall Street expectations for third-quarter revenue on Monday, weighed down by softer enterprise spending on its cloud infrastructure services, and strong competition from larger players.】

item.title: 独家报道美国银行裁撤部分投资银行职位，包括在纽约的职位
item.description: 据三位不愿透露姓名的熟悉情况的消息人士透露，美国银行周一裁撤了一些投资银行业务的职位，包括纽约的职位。【原文：Bank of America eliminated some investment banking roles on Monday, including in New York, according to three sources familiar with the situation who declined to be identified discussing personnel matters.】

item.title: 贝莱德首席执行官芬克称民族主义政策将加剧通货膨胀
item.description: 贝莱德首席执行官拉里-芬克（Larry Fink）周一表示，包括驱逐工人在内的民族主义政策将加剧美国的通货膨胀。【原文：BlackRock Chief Executive Larry Fink said on Monday that inflation in the United States will be elevated by nationalistic policies including the deportation of workers.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，苹果准备对软件进行重大改革
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引熟知内情的人士的话报道，苹果公司正准备在今年晚些时候对其软件进行重大改革，这将改变操作系统的外观以及 iPhone、iPad 和 Mac 的界面。【原文：Apple is preparing a major overhaul of its software, due later this year, which will change the look of the operating systems and the interface of the iPhone, iPad and Mac, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the effort.】

item.title: CERAWEEK 特朗普政府旨在取消石油储备销售，支持小型核能发电
item.description: 美国能源部长克里斯-赖特（Chris Wright）周一表示，他正计划与国会合作，取消此前规定的战略石油储备销售，以此作为解决库存过低问题的一种方法。【原文：U.S. Energy Secretary Chris Wright said on Monday he was planning to work with Congress on cancelling previously mandated sales from the Strategic Petroleum Reserve as one way to address low stockpiles.】

item.title: 美国法官驳回 CFPB 中止对 Comerica 提起诉讼的动议
item.description: 根据周一提交的一份法院命令，德克萨斯州的一名联邦法官驳回了美国消费者金融保护局暂停对科美嘉银行诉讼的动议。【原文：A federal judge in Texas denied the U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau's motion to stay its lawsuit against Comerica Bank, according to a court order filed on Monday.】

item.title: CERAWEEK 弗里波特公司认为，如果特朗普宣布铜为关键资源，每年将增加 5 亿美元的收入
item.description: Freeport-McMoRan 公司首席执行官凯瑟琳-奎克（Kathleen Quirk）周一表示，希望美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在宣布其促进美国采矿业发展的计划时，将铜宣布为关键矿产。【原文：Freeport-McMoRan hopes U.S. President Donald Trump declares copper to be a critical mineral when he announces his plan to boost American mining, CEO Kathleen Quirk said on Monday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，CoreWeave 在上市前与 OpenAI 签订了价值 120 亿美元的合同
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士周一告诉路透社，由英伟达（Nvidia）支持的人工智能初创公司 CoreWeave 已与 OpenAI 签订了一份为期五年、价值 119 亿美元的合同，将在其上市前提供云计算服务。【原文：CoreWeave, an artificial intelligence startup backed by Nvidia , has signed a five-year contract worth $11.9 billion with OpenAI to provide cloud computing services ahead of its hotly anticipated stock market launch, people familiar with the matter told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 汽油运输商与殖民地管道公司就条款修改建议发生冲突
item.description: 至少有四家美国汽油营销商正准备对殖民地管道公司提出法律和监管挑战，因为这些公司认为，拟议中的燃料运输条款变化将损害他们的利润，并推高加油站的燃料价格。【原文：At least four U.S. gasoline marketers are preparing legal and regulatory challenges to the Colonial Pipeline over proposed changes in fuel shipping terms which the companies say will hurt their margins and drive up fuel prices at the pump, sources familiar with the discussions said.】

item.title: CERAWEEK 美国液化天然气出口商寻求重新谈判交易，以弥补不断上涨的成本
item.description: 据路透社查阅的消息来源和公司声明称，由于建筑、劳动力和借贷成本上升，几家美国液化天然气生产商正试图与买家重新谈判更高的价格。【原文：Several U.S. LNG producers are trying to renegotiate higher prices with buyers as a result of rising construction, labor and borrowing costs, according to sources and company statements reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 交易员押注美联储将在经济下滑时快速降息
item.description: 美联储不会在下周的政策会议上降低利率，但如果对贸易战引发经济衰退的担忧升温成真，美联储可能会在 6 月份快速降低借贷成本。【原文：The Federal Reserve won't lower interest rates at its policy meeting next week, but could deliver the first of a set of rapid-fire reductions in borrowing costs in June if rising fears of an economic downturn triggered by a trade war materialize.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会主席表示，美国证券交易委员会将不再要求加密货币公司注册为交易系统
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）代理主席周一表示，他已指示工作人员研究如何放弃一项计划，该计划将扩大另类交易系统的定义，把一些加密货币公司包括在内。【原文：The acting chief of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission said on Monday he has directed staff to look at ways to abandon a plan that would have widened the definition of alternative trading systems to include some cryptocurrency firms.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，欧盟可能对苹果和 Meta 违反 DMA 规定处以适度罚款
item.description: 直接了解此事的人士周一表示，欧盟反垄断监管机构预计将对苹果公司和 Meta Platforms 公司处以适度罚款，因为这两家公司涉嫌违反了旨在约束其权力的具有里程碑意义的规定。【原文：EU antitrust regulators are expected to hand out modest fines to Apple and Meta Platforms for allegedly breaching landmark rules aimed at reining in their power, people with direct knowledge of the matter said on Monday.】

item.title: 富国银行就陷入困境的 4.81 亿美元房地产贷款起诉摩根大通
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo）周一起诉摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase），要求为一笔 4.81 亿美元的商业房地产贷款的投资者追回损失。【原文：Wells Fargo sued JPMorgan Chase on Monday to recover losses for investors in a $481 million commercial real estate loan that was allegedly based on a fraudulently inflated financial metric.】

item.title: 伦敦劳合社预计洛杉矶野火将造成 23 亿美元净损失
item.description: 伦敦劳合社（Lloyd's of London）周一表示，预计近期的洛杉矶野火将造成 23 亿美元的净损失，该保险市场去年的承保利润也有所下降。【原文：Lloyd's of London said on Monday it expected $2.3 billion in net losses caused by the recent Los Angeles wildfires, as the insurance marketplace reported a dip in underwriting profit for last year.】

item.title: 美国 2 月份集装箱进口量接近历史最高水平，关税风险迫在眉睫
item.description: 供应链技术提供商笛卡尔周一表示，2月份美国集装箱进口量同比增长4.7%，但随着美国与中国和其他主要贸易伙伴的贸易战占据上风，未来几个月可能会降温。【原文：U.S. container import volumes increased 4.7% year-on-year in February, but could cool in coming months as the U.S. trade war with China and other key trading partners takes hold, supply chain technology provider Descartes said on Monday.】
